title: Approved Holiday Resort
details: Beautiful, tranquil 1700 sqm Oasis located within the Bay of Weligama at the end of lane, overlooking River. Approx.600 meters bird distance from beach Perfect for exclusive Holiday/Boutique Resort.. Building of 6 Cabanas with Pool approved. Land is sold with Well/Water and Electricity connection for further development or as "turn key" tourist project. Going to be build under supervision of german ingenieur. Payment scheme can be arranged.
